amendment.description: An amendment, offered as a substitute to the Doggett amendment to to prohibit the use of any funds in the bill to promote the sale or export of tobacco products, or to remove or reduce marketing restrictions on the export of U.S. tobacco products to other countries, except for restrictions which are not applied equally to tobacco or tobacco products from all countries.

action.text: Substitute (A023) offered by Mr. Mollohan to the Doggett amendment (A022).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mollohan amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.
